name: Jai Brown (JaINTP)
title: Software Developer | Hobbiest Bug Hunter | Science Enthusiast
bio: I'm a passionate software developer with expertise in building secure, scalable systems. My work spans from hunting vulnerabilities to fiddling with micro-organisms. When I'm not coding or researching, you'll find me with my four-legged debugging partner and my family.

dog.name: Sköll
dog.bio: Sköll is my loyal companion and unofficial code reviewer. With a keen sense for detecting bugs (both software and actual bugs in the backyard), Sköll keeps me grounded and reminds me that not all problems can be solved with more code. Specializes in throw and fetch debugging and mandatory walk breaks.
